resources.string: In Team Mode you will manage your own club and be responsible for the entire team. If you reach your step target the whole team will perform well. \nYou will remain with your club throughout your career and can\'t move to other clubs.

In Player Mode you will sign for a club. If you reach your step target you will perform well, but a team is made up of ten other AI players. \nAs a Player, you will be subject to transfer bids and can switch between clubs.

In Targeted mode you will choose a number of steps that you want to aim for. Regardless of opponent, or league, your performance will be judged against your chosen target. \nThis is an easier mode, but less realistic.

In Scaled mode, the number of steps needed will vary based on what team you are playing and what league they\'re in. You\'ll find your target will fluctuate and more steps will be needed as you climb the leagues. \nThis mode is more difficult, but more realistic.

Welcome to &appname;, the app where your real-life activity will determine your on-field performances. \nMy name\'s James, and I\'ll be your agent. I\'m here to guide you through the app, and your football career.

Before you get on the pitch, we need to do a medical. I\'m gonna need to get in touch with your fitness app and get some details. Don\'t worry though, this info is only used to decide your match performance!"
Alright give me a sec just calling.
I can\'t get in touch with them right now, can we try another?
Can\'t get hold of them, did you give me permission?
Sorry about that, all sorted now got the details.
Next up, you need to decide what you\'re going to be; player or manager. \nBoth modes will take your steps into account, but they\'ll be used in different ways.
Cool, let\'s get you setup as a %1s. \nNext up I\m gonna need to take some details about your %2s.
Come on, you gotta put a name in.
Alright %1s nice to meet you. What\'s your favourite team?
Alright let\'s get %1s in the leagues. What\'s your team colour?

Alright I\'ll get you a contract with %1s. You\'ve got potential but I dunno if you\'re ready. You\'ll be monitored over the next week. Do well, you\'ll stay at the club. Not quite there yet, they\'ll send you out on loan. \nI just need to get a couple more preferences and we\'ll get started.
Alright let\s get %1s setup in %2s. \nI just need to get a couple more preferences and we\'ll get started.
Targeted it is. We\'ll set you up a target, but you can change this at any time. Or if you fancy a specific challenge you can change your target for specific fixtures.
Scaled it is. Each league\s average can be edited at any time. Or if necessary you can change your target for specific fixtures.
Alright then, what\'s your daily target?
Gimme a sec I\'ll find out
Hmm sorry, can\'t seem to get hold of step details, you might have to check with the app yourself.
In the last %1s days, not including today, you\'ve averaged %2s steps a day.
Alright, %1s saved, We\'re almost done with setup I just need to know how many days you want in between games.

Your steps are still important in between games. Half of the days will contribute towards your defensive performance, the other half towards your attacking performance. \nIf you\'re a consistent stepper, you don\'t need many days between games. If you\'d rather be judged on an average of more days, choose more.

Alright, I think that's everything! Let's confirm. 
You'll be manager of %1s starting in %2s. 
You'll play every %3s days, aiming for %4s steps. 
We'll be speaking to %5s to get your steps. 
When you're ready let me know!

Alright, I think that's everything! Let's confirm. 
You'll be manager of %1s starting in %2s. 
You'll play every %3s days. 
We'll be speaking to %4s to get your steps. 
When you're ready let me know!
Excellent! Give me a couple secs to get the details sorted! If you need anything, feel free to give me a call. Good luck!
Sorry still on calls, couple more seconds.
Your career hasn\'t been going long enough to know this yet.
Hey how\'s it going. \nThis is your main menu. The first card is your step progress against your current targets.
The second is the league table which can be expanded. Teams with a light green background are in a promotion place. Teams with a red background are in a relegation place.
The next card is your next, un-played fixture. Hitting Play Match will open up your tactics before getting a result.
Finally, you have 2 cards for your fixtures and results, which can also be amended to show the fixtures/results in the leagues.
Congratulations! You\'ve just unlocked the following badge!
Business man in a white shirt
